original_text: Then they made signs to his father, to find out what he would like to name the child.
korean_text: 그의 아버지께 몸짓하여 무엇으로 이름을 지으려 하는가 물으니

sentences.original_text: Then they made signs to his father
what he would like to name the child
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아이에게 어떤 이름을 붙이고 싶어하는지
